title: Vaccination Clinic for Adults and Children in Newcastle
description: At our vaccination clinic in Newcastle, we provide vaccinations for a range of infectious diseases to help keep your child healthy. Book your vaccination appointment!
cleaned_text: We provide a comprehensive range of vaccinations and injections on site. (Non-eligible vaccinations provided on scripts will need to be purchased beforehand by the patient.)
